title: The Gentle Touch (1956 - UK) [Ealing Studios] student nurses
description:
The Gentle Touch (1956 - UK)              aka The Feminine Touch / A Lamp Is Heavy

Drama / Comedy
 
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0050428/


An Ealing Studios Michael Balcon Production

Filmed at Guy's Hospital, Southwark, London, England, UK

The film follows five very different student nurses during their first year of training at a National Health Service hospital in London called St. Augustine's, where they live in a dormitory. Susan is reliable and sensible, Pat is flighty and open, Maureen is Irish and loud, Ann is a typical public school girl, and Liz comes from a typical working class background. As they get to know each other, they bond in spite of their differences.


Video: MPEG4 Video (H264), 672x400, 25.000 fps, 1967 Kbps, 01h27m42s
Audio: Dolby AC3, 48000 Hz, stereo, 256 kbps

DVDRip, English audio, no subtitles
